# Load raw data from the "Genes" dataset:
```{r}
# We create a function that reads all sheets from a given excel file:
read_excel_sheets <- function(file_path) {
  sheets <- excel_sheets(file_path)
  map(sheets,
      ~ read_excel(file_path, 
                           sheet = .x))
}

# Now, we make a list of all files inside the "Genes" folder:
folder_path <- "../data/_raw/Genes" 
excel_files <- list.files(folder_path, 
                          pattern = "\\.xlsx$", 
                          full.names = TRUE)

# Finally, we apply the read_excel_sheets function to every excel file in the excel_files list:
all_sheets <- map(excel_files, 
                  read_excel_sheets)

# The final object is a list of lists of excel sheets data:
all_sheets
```
